title: login (incorrect password
body: i have been having an issue where every now and again the client will refuse to accept my password and in order to play i have to create a new one, my account is "sliceruser" i'm not sure if someone is somehow changing my password or if this is a client bug but it is a pain to deal with

replies.body: I'd like to help!  Is North America selected as your region on the login screen?  I also recommend restarting your client just in case a reconnection  might be needed to get your network aligned to our services.  Let me know if that helps.

na is the selected region, and i didnt try restarting the client, it seems to happen every day or other day the last week or so. if it happens again i will try restarting the client. the actual error message just says my password is incorrect and ive never had the issue before hand. ill try it out though and come back if it doesnt work, thanks for the quick response
